summary.span: 用作 控件的根类。

span.span: Serves as the root class of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类公开图表窗口控件的所有属性、方法和事件。This class exposes all of the properties, methods and events of the Chart Windows control. 类的两个重要属性 是 和 属性，两者都是集合属性。Two important properties of the class are the and properties, both of which are collection properties. 集合属性存储 对象，这些对象用于存储要显示的数据，以及这些数据的属性。The collection property stores objects, which are used to store data that is to be displayed, along with attributes of that data. 集合属性存储 对象，这些对象主要用于使用一组轴绘制一个或多个图表。The collection property stores objects, which are primarily used to draw one or more charts using one set of axes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此构造函数 在运行时创建类的新实例。You can use this constructor to create a new instance of the class at run time. 但是，为简单起见，建议您 在设计时创建实例。However, for simplicity, it is recommended that you create a instance at design time. 这是控件的根对象 。This is the root object of the control.

summary.span: 使用升序排序顺序排列图表中的指定系列。

span.span: The specified series in the chart are aligned using an ascending sort order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于使用轴标签沿 X 轴排列不同序列中的数据点，适用于以下情况：This method is used to align data points from different series along the X axis using their axis labels, and is applicable when: - 显示多个序列并编制索引;也就是说，所有数据点均为 0，或者 属性为 `true` 。Multiple series are displayed and are indexed; that is, all data points have an of 0, or the property is `true`. - 所有数据点的轴标签都是唯一的，它们都是唯一的 。All data points have non-empty axis labels, which are unique to their . 如果它们不是唯一的，则将引发异常。If they are not unique, an exception will be thrown. 当数据绑定导致创建多个序列并且 `string` 值用于 X 轴值时，这种情况很常见。This situation is very common when data-binding results in the creation of multiple series, and `string` values are used for X-axis values. 绘制多个索引序列并使用值设置 X 值时，会出现两个问题 `string` ：Two issues arise when multiple, indexed series are plotted, and the X-values are set using `string` values: - 无法保证不同序列中具有相同字符串 X 值的数据点将在沿 X 轴的同一索引处绘制。It cannot be guaranteed that data points from different series with the same string X-values will be plotted at the same index along the X axis. - 将仅显示第一个序列中数据点的轴标签，即使来自具有相同索引的其他序列的数据点也具有轴标签也是如此。Only the axis label for the data points in the first series will be displayed, even though data points from other series with the same index have axis labels too. 默认情况下，点按其在序列中的存储顺序进行绘制。By default, points are plotted in the order in which they are stored in their series. 若要指定排序顺序，请使用 `AlignDataPointsByAxisLabel` 包含参数的方法重载 `sortingOrder` 。To specify a sort order, use an `AlignDataPointsByAxisLabel` method overload that has a `sortingOrder` parameter.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值决定绘制文本和图形时是否使用抗锯齿功能。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether anti-aliasing is used when text and graphics are drawn.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值决定绘制文本和图形时是否使用抗锯齿功能。

span.span: An enumeration value that determines whether anti-aliasing is used when text and graphics are drawn.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消除锯齿功能通过使用中间颜色填充像素来使得 "交错边缘"，对于不作为矩形绘制的图表，尤其适用于对边缘进行平滑处理。Anti-aliasing smoothens out "jagged edges" by padding pixels with intermediate colors, and is especially effective for smoothing out edges for charts that are not drawn as rectangles. 例如，抗锯齿功能对于折线图和饼图非常有效，但不适用于条形图和柱形图。For example, anti-aliasing is very effective for line charts and pie charts, but is not as effective for bar and column charts. 抗锯齿功能可以应用于文本和/或图形基元，如矩形、圆形等。Anti-aliasing can be applied to text and/or graphics primitives such as rectangles, circles, and so forth. 请注意，抗锯齿会影响性能。Note that anti-aliasing will affect performance.

summary.span: 设置自动分配的系列和数据点颜色，以允许在运行时以编程方式进行访问。

span.span: Sets the automatically assigned series and data point colors, to allow programmatic access at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在 运行时自动分配了颜色，则没有办法知道呈现图表之前的颜色，此时 `Color` 将返回自动分配的值的 "属性" 。When the colors are automatically assigned at run time, there is no way to know what the colors will be prior to the time when the chart rendered; the `Color` property of an automatically assigned value will return at this time. 如果调用 方法，将设置序列和数据点的颜色，这允许以编程方式进行访问。If you call the method, the colors for the series and the data points will be set, which allows for programmatic access.

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the object.

span.span: A value used to draw the background color of the chart.

value.span: 默认颜色为 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可将此属性设置为任何有效的 ARGB (alpha、红色、绿色、蓝色) 值。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 请注意，对于 对象，alpha 组件不能设置为255以外的值。Note that for the object, the alpha component cannot be set to a value other than 255. 这也意味着 仅对于对象， 不能使用值。This also means that, for the object only, a value cannot be used. 如果使用背景的渐变颜色，则该值将为第一种使用的颜色。The value will be the first color used if you are using gradient colors for the background. Alpha 值控制颜色的不透明度。The alpha value controls the opacity of a color. 如果将此颜色设置为 "透明"-也就是说，如果使用的 alpha 值为0，则不会将颜色分配给标题的背景。If you set this color to "transparent" - that is, if you use an alpha value of 0 - no color will be assigned to the background of the title. 因此，背景将是透明的。As a result, the background will be transparent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定 控件是否将显示渐变，并确定渐变的方向（如果使用）。Use the property to determine whether a control will display a gradient, and to determine the orientation of the gradient if one is used. 有关可用模式的列表，请参阅 枚举。For a listing of available patterns, refer to the enumeration. 使用渐变颜色：To use gradient colors: 用属性设置图表背景的主要颜色 。Set the primary color of the chart background with the property. 用属性设置图表背景的辅助颜色 。Set the secondary color of the chart background with the property. 将此 属性设置为所需的渐变样式。Set this property to the desired gradient style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性定义图例的背景图像路径 ，可以是绝对或相对 URL。This property defines a path to a background image for a legend, and can be an absolute or relative URL. 若要定位图像，请使用 和 属性。To position the image, use the and properties. 还可以通过设置属性，将图像显示的一种颜色指定为 "透明" 。You can also specify one of the colors displayed by the image as "transparent", by setting the property. 图像可以来自 .NET Framework 支持的任何有效图形文件，包括图标。An image can originate from any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons. 背景图像优先于其他背景属性，如渐变颜色。Background images take precedence over other background properties such as gradient color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定图像的显示方式，例如，平铺、缩放等。This property determines how the image is displayed, for example, tiled, scaled, and so forth. 如果缩放图像，则该图像将拉伸以适合图表边界内。If an image is scaled, it will be stretched to fit within the bounds of the chart. 如果图像已平铺，则从图表左上角开始，重复绘制图像。If the image is tiled, it is repeatedly drawn, starting from the top-left corner of the chart. 如果将 `BackImageWrapMode` 属性设置为 ，则绘制图像的位置由 属性设置确定。If the `BackImageWrapMode` property is set to , the location where the image is drawn is determined by the property setting. 有关可用包装模式的详细信息，请参阅 枚举文章。For more information about the available wrapping modes, see the enumeration article.

summary.span: 确定位于由所给定 X、Y 坐标定义的点处的图表元素（如果有）。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法以确定位于指定点处的图表元素（如果有）。Call this method to determine the chart element, if any, that is located at a specified point. 此方法通常用于一些与鼠标相关的事件，例如，用于 确定最终用户单击的图表元素。This method is often used in some mouse-related event - for example, - to determine which chart element the end-user clicked. 然后，将使用从事件参数获取的 X 和 Y 鼠标坐标作为 `x` `y` 此方法调用的和参数值。The X and Y mouse coordinates obtained from the event parameters are then used for the `x` and `y` parameter values of this method call. 然后，可以使用所返回对象的属性来确定所单击的图表元素; 该 对象还提供选定的实际对象的实例（如果有）。The properties of the object that is returned can then be used to determine which chart element was clicked; the object also provides an instance of the actual object selected, if any.

summary.span: 将图像流中的模板加载到 控件中。

span.span: Loads a template into the control from an image stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要从流加载模板（如内存流、文件流等），请使用此方法。Use this method if you want to load a template from a stream, such as a memory stream, file stream, and so forth. 请确保在 `true` 通过方法保存模板之前将属性设置为 。Make sure to set the property to `true` before saving the template with the method. 如果加载的模板具有两个数据序列，则序列的外观属性将按顺序应用到图表中。If a loaded template has two data series, the appearance properties of the series are applied sequentially to the chart. 换句话说，第一个模板系列外观属性将分配给图表的第一系列，第二个模板系列外观属性将应用于图表的第二个序列，然后将再次使用第一个模板系列作为图表的第三个序列，依此类推。In other words, the first template series appearance properties are assigned to the first series of the chart, the second template series appearance properties are applied to the second series of the chart, then the first template series is used again for the third series of the chart, and so on. 这同样适用于图表区域和具有外观属性的任何其他集合。The same holds true for chart areas, and any other collections that have appearance properties. 模板可用于模拟自定义调色板。Templates can be used to simulate custom palettes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `name`参数必须使用完整路径，例如 C:\MyPic.jpg。The `name` parameter must use a full path, for example, C:\MyPic.jpg. 请注意，还必须指定文件扩展名。Note that you must also specify the file extension. 此方法从使用方法保存的磁盘加载模板 。This method loads a template from disk that was saved using the method. 请确保在 `true` 通过方法保存模板之前将属性设置为 。Make sure to set the property to `true` before saving the template with the method. 如果加载的模板具有两个数据序列，则序列的外观属性将按顺序应用到图表中。If a loaded template has two data series, the appearance properties of the series are applied sequentially to the chart. 换句话说，第一个模板系列外观属性将分配给图表的第一系列，第二个模板系列外观属性将应用于图表的第二个序列，然后将再次使用第一个模板系列作为图表的第三个序列，依此类推。In other words, the first template series appearance properties are assigned to the first series of the chart, the second template series appearance properties are applied to the second series of the chart, then the first template series is used again for the third series of the chart, and so on. 这同样适用于图表区域和具有外观属性的任何其他集合。The same holds true for chart areas, and any other collections that have appearance properties. 模板可用于模拟自定义调色板。Templates can be used to simulate custom palettes.

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的调色板。

span.span: Gets or sets the palette for the control.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值决定了要使用的调色板。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the palette to be used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果满足以下两个条件，则使用调色板自动将颜色分配给数据元素：A palette is used to automatically assign colors to data elements if both of the following conditions have been met: - 数据点本身不会分配颜色。the data points themselves do not have colors assigned to them. - 数据点所属的数据序列也没有分配的颜色。the data series that the data points belong to also does not have an assigned color. 如果未显式指定序列或数据点颜色，则所使用的颜色将取决于图表类型和 对象的调色板，或者如果指定了一个，则为关联序列的调色板。If no series or data point colors are explicitly specified, the colors used depend on the chart type and the object's palette or the palette of an associated series, if one is specified. > [!NOTE] > 如果 `Palette` 和对象的属性 设置为 ，并且没有为相关数据序列或数据点分配任何颜色，则不会绘制数据点，并且这些数据点将显示为 "空" 区域。If the `Palette` property for both the and objects is set to , and no color is assigned to the relevant data series or data points, the data points will not be drawn and will be displayed as "empty" areas.

summary.span: 获取或设置自定义调色板颜色的数组。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of custom palette colors.

value.span: 对象的数组，这些对象表示图表上的系列使用的颜色集。

span.span: An array of objects that represent the set of colors used for series on the chart.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要的颜色超过16种，或者需要将自己的颜色应用于图表，则必须定义自定义调色板。If you need more than 16 colors or you want to apply your own colors to the chart, you must define a custom palette. 使用自定义调色板可以按颜色在图表上的所需显示顺序来添加您自己的颜色。A custom palette let you add your own colors in the order you want them to appear on the chart. 如果图表中的序列数在设计时是未知的，则此类型的调色板特别有用。This type of palette is especially helpful if the number of series in your chart is unknown at design time. 当 属性 *未* 设置为时，此属性不起作用 。This property has no effect when the property is *not* set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 打印图表时，将打印除滚动条之外的所有图表元素。When a chart is printed, all chart elements except scrollbars will be printed. 对象包含以下用于基本打印操作的方法：The object contains the following methods, which are used for basic printing operations: ：显示 "页面设置" 对话框，该对话框允许最终用户选择纸张大小、纸张来源、页面方向等。: Displays a Page Setup dialog, which allows the end-user to select paper size, paper source, page orientation, and so forth. ：显示 "打印预览" 对话框，该对话框允许最终用户缩放、打印图表等。: Displays a Print Preview dialog, which allows the end-user to zoom, print the chart, and so forth. ：打印 ; 打印对话框可以选择在打印之前显示。: Prints the ; the Print dialog can optionally be displayed prior to printing.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个标志，该标志决定了是否应取消显示非关键性异常。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that determines whether non-critical exceptions should be suppressed.

value.span: 如果应取消显示非关键性异常，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if non-critical exceptions should be suppressed; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为 `true` ，则将禁止显示非严重异常。If you set this property to `true`, non-critical exceptions will be suppressed. 如果 控件无法使用所提供的数据和其他设置正确绘制图表，则会引发异常。When the control cannot properly plot the chart using the data and other settings provided, an exception will be thrown. 尽管在应用程序测试期间显示异常非常有用，但在发布应用程序时不应显示异常。Although displaying exceptions is useful during application testing, they should not be shown when the application is released. > [!NOTE] > 将此属性设置为 `true` 可能会隐藏用户应用程序源代码中的严重问题。Setting this property to `true` may hide serious issues in the user application source code. 此设置还可能会导致生成可能会误报你的数据的图表图像。This setting could also cause a chart image to be generated that might misrepresent your data. 强烈建议仅在发布版本中使用此模式。It is highly recommended that this mode be only used in Release builds.
